alert.note: Alert for Dixie; Lafayette; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 7:04PM EDT until April 27 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Dixie County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 704 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Dowling Park to 47 miles southwest of Horseshoe Point, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayo, Cross City, Steinhatchee, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Pinland, Tennille, Shamrock, Jug Island, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Buckville, Dekle Beach, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Hatch Bend and Salem. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
